entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING ENDED, Brandon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:26 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -8.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brandon Airport 9:00 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -8.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -10.0°C
Wind: NE 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h becoming north 20 overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 9:28 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 9:28 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:28 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
